sourceMeaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>flag</radical> stuck in the ground with a little bit of <radical>fur</radical> coming out from it and on closer inspection you realize it’s actually a <kanji>tail</kanji>. Someone stuck a flag into some sort of animal, pushing it under the ground. All that’s visible now is some fur and part of the tail.
meaningInfo: What kind of animal could it be? You start to feel the soft fur with your hand and then the stench of death hits your nostrils. Ew.
readingMnemonic: You try to pull the flag out of the ground and hear a rumbling buzzing sound. At the end of the flagpole you see a huge <reading>bee</reading>hive (<ja>び</ja>)! These bees made their home under the <kanji>tail</kanji>! Maybe that’s why the flag was sticking in it… to warn people. Oops.
readingInfo: See the bees swarming out from around the tail and toward your face. Run! Run before there’s nothing left of you but your own tail!
